title: "Attorney-General challenges Opposition Leader to clarify support on Indigenous Voice"
excerpt: "Attorney-General Mark Dreyfus is challenging Opposition Leader Peter Dutton to make it clear whether he supports an Indigenous Voice to Parliament. The Opposition Leader personally confirmed support for constitutional recognition of Indigenous Australians but so far the Liberal Party refuses to take a stance and is asking for more detail."
